get.summary: Get payment type fee and security setup
get.description: Get a list of payment types along with their fee and security setup.
Get a collection of groups of payment types to get an overview of the payment types accepted in your Checkout.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Match an ISO 4271 alphabetic currency code.

parameters.name: cardnumberprefix
parameters.description: The first 6 numbers of a card number is queried in our BIN/IIN database and matches applicable payment types.

parameters.name: acquirername
parameters.description: Match payment types by acquirer name.

parameters.name: paymentcollectiontypes
parameters.description: Types of payment collections to include.

parameters.name: supports
parameters.description: Criterion the payment types should support.

get.description: Get a list of transactions. Optionally, the transactions can be filtered by a filters query. Note: Pagination is implemented by providing the meta.paging.lastevaluatedkey property from the response to the next request via the exclusivestartkey query parameter. When no more transactions are available, the meta.paging.itemsreturned property in the response will show a number less than the pagesize request query parameter.

parameters.name: exclusivestartkey
parameters.description: The next key to start from.

parameters.name: engine
parameters.description: Which engine to retrieve results from.

get.description: Get the details of a transaction by its ID.

get.summary: Get transaction invoices and credit notes
get.description: Get a list of invoices and credit notes for a transaction by its ID.
Get an invoice or a credit note for a transaction operation by its ID. If the operation is crediting then a credit note will be returned, otherwise an invoice object will be returned.
Get a list of operations performed on a transaction by its ID.
Get the details of an operation performed on a transaction by the transaction ID and the ID of the operation.

code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 representation of the currency

number.description: The ISO 3166-1 numeric-3 representation of the currency

minorunits.description: Number of minor units for the currency, that is, the number of significant decimal places

method.description: The distribution method used for the invoice(s) to the customer.

locked.description: If the domain is locked it can't be edited

attention.description: Attention to use, for example if the e-mail address is shared between users

zip.description: The ZIP code of the customers address

id.description: The id or SKU of the product on the invoice line

linenumber.description: The number of the invoice line

description.description: A short description of the invoice line

text.description: A descriptive text of the invoice line

quantity.description: The quantity of the product in the invoice line

unitprice.description: The price of one unit without VAT

unitpriceinclvat.description: The price of one unit including VAT

totalprice.description: The total price of all units including VAT. quantity * unitprice

totalpriceinclvat.description: The total price of all units without VAT. quantity * unitpriceinclvat

totalpricevatamount.description: The total VAT of all units. quantity * unitpricevatamount

zip.description: The ZIP code to the receiver adress

vatamount.description: The VAT of the total amount

code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the language to use

uniquereferencetimeout.description: The timeout value of for how long OrderID is checked for uniqueness. Value in minutes

md5key.description: The secret key used for hashing the payment parameteres

failedcallbackemail.description: E-mail address to notify if callback fails

countrycode.description: The country iso code of the merchant (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3)

lastevaluatedkey.description: The last evaluated key. For next page set exclusivestartkey to this value

itemsreturned.description: Number of items returned in the list

id.description: The ID of the payment type

name.description: The (system) name of the payment type

displayname.description: The display name of the payment type

groupid.description: The group ID of the payment type

uniquereferencetimeout.description: The timeout value of for how long OrderID is checked for uniqueness. Value in minutes

md5key.description: The secret key used for hashing the payment parameteres

failedcallbackemail.description: E-mail address to notify if callback fails

countrycode.description: The country iso code of the merchant (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3)

source.description: Origin of the action code. If this begins with ePay the origin is ePay's system.

code.description: The response code from the source

type.description: Type of the action code (e.g. generalerror)

locked.description: If the domain is locked it can't be edited

uniquereferencetimeout.description: The timeout value of for how long OrderID is checked for uniqueness. Value in minutes

md5key.description: The secret key used for hashing the payment parameteres

failedcallbackemail.description: E-mail address to notify if callback fails

countrycode.description: The country iso code of the merchant (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3)

enduser.description: Message to show the end user

merchant.description: Message to show the merchant. This may not be shown to the end user

result.description: Result of the request. True means success, false means error.

paymenttypefees.description: A list of payment type fees.

id.description: The ID of the payment type fee

agreementid.description: The agreement ID of the payment type fee

feecalculatorname.description: The name of the fee/surcharge calculator to use

order.description: If more payment type fee items fullfill the requirements this order can be used to choose

securitylevel.description: The security level to use when using this payment type fee

parenttransactionoperationid.description: Unique ID of the hierachical parent operation

currentbalance.description: The current balance indicates the balance of the transaction

clientipaddress.description: The IP address of the client/cardholder

status.description: The status of the transaction operation

actionbysystem.description: Name of the system that performed the operation

actioncode.description: The response code (only unique when combined with actionsource)

actionsource.description: Source of the response code. The source can relate to both internal and external systems

acquirername.description: Name of the Acquirer used when performing the operation

walletname.description: Name of the Wallet used when performing the operation

iscapturemulti.description: Boolean indicating if multiple captures are possible

acquirerreference.description: The reference the operation is known by by the acquirer

accesstoken.description: Unique access token of the web user

lastchangedpassworddate.description: Date when the password was last changed

email.description: The e-mail associated with the webuser

phone.description: The phone number associated with the webuser

email.description: E-mail of API user. We will contact this e-mail if any issues occur

id.description: The payment type fee ID used to calculate fee amount

amount.description: The fee amount to authorize. Defined in minor units

name.description: The name of the invitation recipient.

senderemail.description: The e-mail address of the sender.

recipientemail.description: The e-mail address of the recipient.

id.description: The ID of the payment type

name.description: The (system) name of the payment type

displayname.description: The display name of the payment type

groupid.description: The group ID of the payment type

expiredate.description: A date used to control when the API user expires

status.description: Status indicating whether the API user is active

email.description: E-mail of API user. We will contact this e-mail if any issues occur

invitationid.description: The unique id of the invitation

email.description: The e-mail associated with the webuser

phone.description: The phone number associated with the webuser

accesstoken.description: The unique access token for the API user

secrettoken.description: The secret token of the created API user. This is only returned once so be sure to save it a secure place

accesstoken.description: Access token for the API user

createddate.description: Created date for the API user

expiredate.description: Expire date for the API user

email.description: E-mail of API user. We will contact this e-mail if any issues occur

createddate.description: The creation date of the invitation in ISO 8601 format.

accepteddate.description: The date in ISO 8601 format when the invitation was accepted.

usercreated.description: Indicates whether the invited user has been created or not.

invitedbyaccesstoken.description: Access token of the user who created the invitation.

name.description: The name of the invitation recipient.

senderemail.description: The e-mail address of the sender.

recipientemail.description: The e-mail address of the recipient.

invoices.description: A list of invoices and credit notes.

transactionoperationid.description: The ID of the transaction operation associated with the invoice or credit note

type.description: The document type, e.g. an invoice or a credit note.

currency.description: The currency of the total and invoice lines

address.description: Address (streetname and number) of the person.

version.description: Version of the Lindorff customer evaluation.

firstoperand.description: First operand of the evaluation criterion.

secondoperand.description: Second operand of the evaluation criterion.

comparisonoperator.description: Comparison operator used on the operands.

suggestedpaymentoptionid.description: The ID of the payment option suggested by Lindorff.

id.description: The ID of the part payment question.

text.description: The text for the part payment question.

tooltip.description: The tooltip that can be shown for the part payment question.
tooltip.example: Your average monthly income before tax has been payed.

preferredwidth.description: Preferred width of the input field. Follows Bootstrap grid system with 12 column layout.

placeholdertext.description: Placeholder text that can be displayed in e.g. an input field.

unit.description: The unit of the provided answer.

options.description: Possible answer options for the part payment question. Either <range> or <options> is returned, not both.

id.description: The ID of the question option.

text.description: The text for the question option.

min.description: The minimum value of the range.

max.description: The maximum value of the range.

increment.description: Increments that the answer can be given in within the range.

currency.description: The currency of the payment option as an ISO 4217 code.

paymentoptionid.description: The ID of the payment option.

termsurl.description: A URL linking to the Standardized European Customer Credit Information (SECCI) for the payment option.

monthlyfee.description: The monthly fee, given as an amount in minor units.

arrangementfee.description: The arrangement fee, given as an amount in minor units.

totalfee.description: The total fee to be paid for the payment option, given as an amount in minor units.

totalinterest.description: The total interest to be paid for the payment option, in minor units.

totalcapital.description: The total capital to be paid for the payment option, in minor units.

totalamount.description: Total amount to be paid if the payment option is selected, in minor units.

payments.description: The individual payments for the payment option.

paymentnumber.description: The ordered number of the payment.

invoicedate.description: Creation date of the invoice for this payment.

duedate.description: Due date of the invoice for this payment.

interest.description: The interest to be paid on this payment, in minor units.

fee.description: The fee to be paid on this payment, in minor units.

capital.description: The capital to be paid on this payment, in minor units.

paymenttotal.description: The total amount to be paid on this payment, in minor units.

id.description: The ID of the payment type

groupid.description: The group ID of the payment type

displayname.description: The display name of the payment type

number.description: The Primary Account Number for this transaction. This value can be trunctaed card number, mobile number, token in 3. party system and so on

id.description: The ID of the subscription the transaction was made from

transactionoperations.description: List of operations performed on the transaction.

phone.description: The phone number for the user.

accesstoken.description: Unique access token of the web user.

orderid.description: The order ID. Often the same as the order ID in the shop system

createddate.description: The date the transaction was created

candelete.description: If the transaction can be deleted

reference.description: A 12 digit reference for the transaction

parenttransactionoperationid.description: Unique ID of the hierachical parent operation

currentbalance.description: The current balance indicates the balance of the transaction

clientipaddress.description: The IP address of the client/cardholder

status.description: The status of the transaction operation

actionbysystem.description: Name of the system that performed the operation

actioncode.description: The response code (only unique when combined with actionsource)

actionsource.description: Source of the response code. The source can relate to both internal and external systems

acquirername.description: Name of the Acquirer used when performing the operation

walletname.description: Name of the Wallet used when performing the operation

iscapturemulti.description: Boolean indicating if multiple captures are possible

acquirerreference.description: The reference the operation is known by by the acquirer
